release.description: New minimum Jenkins version requirement. Fix slave execution issues.
release.action: JENKINS-34334: java.io.NotSerializableException when plugin is executed on a slave node

release.description: Fix variable expansion issues, extend list of supported formats.
release.action: JENKINS-32973: Extend the list of supported result file formats to the supported list of Klaros-Testmanagement 4.4
JENKINS-30369: Support specifying result file formats during result publishing
JENKINS-30338: Send additional build information while exporting test results
JENKINS-30337: Support build environment and build parameter variables
JENKINS-28659: Add proper migration of test result path settings for existing projects
JENKINS-28296: Add support for iteration assignment of imported test runs
JENKINS-27596: Support the creation of test suites on test result import
JENKINS-27593: Do not try to export test results for canceled or broken builds
JENKINS-27592: Support multiple test result set specifications for uploading
JENKINS-15744: Whitespace at the end of input fields leads to bogus file upload
No longer tries to access the master instance on slave nodes.
No longer sends authentication parameters for empty user names.
Remote messages from slaves now work correctly.
Support for user authentication (Introduced with Klaros 2.6).
Connections to the server can now be tested from the GUI.
Trailing slashes in application URLs are now handled correctly.
